name: Chips
description: Chip component for compact elements that can represent tags, filters, or selections. Extends MUI Chip with a custom 'rounded' variant for pill-shaped chips.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the chip is disabled

examples.title: Deletable
examples.code:
import { Chips } from '@/components';

<Chips label="Filter" variant="rounded" onDelete={() => {}} />

examples.title: With Icon

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Chip with Chips. Note the name is 'Chips' not 'Chip'. Custom 'rounded' variant available.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Enter or Space activates/deletes chip, Backspace deletes
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Chip label and deletable state are announced

whenNotToUse: For status badges on elements (use Badge instead)
For semantic status labels (use Tag instead)
bestPractices: Use onDelete to make chips removable
Use rounded variant for filter pills
